@Hawko_1985 I've had the same issue with Cinavia on PS3. Its a playstation thing to cut back on pirating of bluerays. The best solution I found to work around this is that I just stream them onto my Xbox 360 instead. Xbox also streams better anyway with little to no lagging unlike PS3 and you do not have to spend 10-15 mins copying the files off your computer to your PS to avoid the lagging issue.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5821849/Aimersoft_Video_Converter_Ultimate_4.0.2_drm_remover This will get rid of Cinavia.  If it doesn't then search for other Video Converters. There are PLENTY of them that will let you get rid of Cinavia.
